text: Sue Devaney (born Susan Barber; 2 July 1967) is an English actress, known for portraying the roles of Debbie Webster in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street (1984–1985, 2019–present), Rita in the BBC children's kitchen sink realism programme Jonny Briggs (1985–1987), Liz Harker in the BBC medical drama series Casualty (1994–1997), and Jane in the BBC sitcom Dinnerladies (1998–2000). ==Other websites== * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:English stage actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:Actors from Lancashire Category:Actors from Greater Manchester
title: Sue Devaney
